definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: a city of Manasseh in West-Jordan land Jos 17:11 (JE; but ´[[יִב]] here dub., v. Bu:RS 13 f.), Ju Jdg 1:27, 2Ki 9:27; so rd. also 2Ki 15:10 for MT [[קָבָל־עָם]] (LXXL e)n Ieblaam; v. Klo); = [[בִּלְעָם]] 1Ch 6:55, q.v.; rd. [[יִבְלְעָם]] also in Jos 21:25 (‖ 1Ch 6:55), for MT [[גֵּתּ רִמּוֹן]], LXX Iebaqa (LXXL after MT Geqremmwn, v. Di; it lay about 13 m. E. of N. fr. Samaria, three-fifths of the way to Jezreel; mod. ruin Bel‘ame Bd:Pal 228, cf. Schultz:ZMG iii. 49; (Old Egypt. Y-b-ra-‘a-mu WMM:195).
